name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FACEIT to Leetify Demo Uploader by CSNADES.gg

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically upload FACEIT match demos to Leetify. Made by CSNADES.gg

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension adds a button on the FACEIT match page to send the demo to Leetify for processing. With a single click, you can get back all your Leetify stats from FACEIT. You can also get FACEIT demos directly from the Leetify match page as well as the match list page.

Features:
- Send FACEIT match demos to Leetify with a single click
- Auto upload demo to Leetify once FACEIT match is finished
- Link to Leetify match stats from FACEIT match page
- Ability to wait for FACEIT demo to be ready when match is finished
- Import FACEIT match demos directly from Leetify
- Free and open source. No data collection


The FACEIT to Leetify Demo Uploader extension is built by https://csnades.gg, the best website to learn Counter-Strike nade lineups.

You can view the source code at https://github.com/CSNADESgg/faceit-to-leetify-extension
